    • Method Detail

      • add

        @RequestMapping(value="/add")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView add()
        Method redirects to page where user can add new candidate.
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • addCandidate

        @RequestMapping(value="/addCandidate",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addCandidate(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        This method add all information about new candidate from huge form. If method can not create new candidate or add his mail will return this page(..add.jsp) with error message. All contacts(excepts MAIL) and skills can be empty.
        Parameters:
        params - Map
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • candidatesList

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView candidatesList()
        Method sorts List by Date using candidateDAO.sortByDate(), and returns index page with paging number 1. It ia default sorting.
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • candidatesListByName

        @RequestMapping(value="/sortByName")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView candidatesListByName()
        Method returns index page sorted by name with paging number 1.
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • delete

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView delete(@RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                             int id)
        Deleting candidate by id from database. Also will be deleted all entities that aggregated and mapped by Candidate(Skill and Contact), because cascade = CascadeType.ALL. Method returns index page sorted by date with paging number 1. If method will catch Exception it will return page with error message.
        Parameters:
        id - int
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • getModel

        public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getModel(java.lang.String sort,
                                                             int page)
        Method with main model logic of index page. Method try to find type of sort, and page number to return. ModelAndView contains sorted candidates List, pages amount, number of page and sort type for var in index page. If exception happens method will return index page with exception message using getModelError().
        Parameters:
        sort - Spring shows type of sorting
        page - int
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • getModelError

        public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getModelError(java.lang.String page,
                                                                  java.lang.String message)
        Method returns ModelAndView with incoming page end message. As usual this method serve Exception situations in MainController
        Parameters:
        page - String
        message - String
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • getPagesCount

        public int getPagesCount(int count)
        Returns maximum pages amount for all candidates
        Parameters:
        count - int
        Returns:
        int

      • info

        @RequestMapping(value="/candidateInfo")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView info(@RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                                  int id)
        Method redirects to page where user can find all info about candidate by his id. If method will catch Exception it will return page with error message.
        Parameters:
        id - int
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • paging

        @RequestMapping(value="/paging",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView paging(@RequestParam(value="page")
                                                                                                                          int page,
                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="sort")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String sort)
        Method returns ModelAndView with List, number of page, and pages amount.
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • search

        @RequestMapping(value="/search",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView search(@RequestParam(value="pattern")
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String pattern)
        Method returns index page sorted by pattern with paging number 1.
        Parameters:
        pattern - String
        Returns:
        ModelAndView
